directions: Combine all ingredients except persimmons in heavy large saucepan. Bring to boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until mixture thickens but some juices remain, stirring frequently, about 25 minutes. Add persimmons and simmer until persimmons are tender, about 5 minutes longer. Remove from heat and cool completely. (Can be prepared 3 days ahead. Cover and refrigerate.
ingredients: 1 large Pippin apple (about 8 ounces), peeled, cored, chopped
1 large jalapeño chili with seeds, minced
2 1/2 cups chopped peeled Fuyu persimmons (about 4 medium)
title: Spiced Persimmon Chutney
